document.full_text: what if big brown, smarty jones, barbaro and monarchos all ran in the same kentucky derby? in fact, what if every derby winner from the past 20 years were put in the same starting gate?
document.title: the rail: the ultimate kentucky derby
lines_and_colors: what if big brown, smarty jones, barbaro and monarchos all ran in the same kentucky derby? in fact, what if every derby winner from the past 20 years were put in the same starting gate?
